Text:
only 1 episode left.
 I wonder if there will be a season 3 or will they cancel it and make something new?
I have mixed feelings on the subject, as much as I like this show it isn't the iron man I know from the comics.

i agree that it isnt the same comic, but it is such an entertaining show, especially considered to the dumbed down alternatives like super hero squad or any of the other wack comics.. i seriously hope for a season 3 and 4!!! 

by the way, thanks for the timely episode!
